message: Convore just released their iPhone app for those that are interested http://blog.convore.com/post/3748606742/convore-iphone-app
Thx Eric.  Works fine now.
@Jabushey If your username has a special character in it you might not be able to log in.  I think they have an update on the way to fix this.
@Jabushey Whoops, sorry about the troubles, turns out the username was case sensitive on the iPhone. That should be fixed now.
Very cool. This "CONVORE" thing is sort of addicting! Another app taking my time ;-))
just plain old letters
Just downloaded it, but I can't log in, even with my existing username and password
App working fine for me. Looks slick for the first release!
Thx! Replying now via convore app ;)
loving this app.  now I don't have to worry about my unread count going through the roof while away from my computer.
Love the new app well done to all involved very slick !!
Very fast! Thanks.
Just one for the suggestion box; would be cool to see a consolidated page for @mentions
Slick!
Excellent, next an iPad app :)
That is great just downloading now :)
I have been using the app and I really like it it certainly adds to the Convore experience
The app works great for me too. I would like to see a photo uploading tool built-in and a way to go to a specific group URL instead of just the search feature.
Absolutly perfect start, I was jonesing for a app on the iPhone so incould properly get stuck into convore
I heart convore so much.

Wow. This is a great app. IRC and forums are dead to me now. I hope everyone flocks here and it survives. I loved Pownce.

Congratulations! I really like it!
